script.name: setup.plugin.autotrade
script.description: Autotrade - Initialisation of sector- and universetrader scripts

line.comment: * makes an additional log entry due load games or new games
*set script command upgrade: command=$cmd.sector upgrade=$cmd.ware script='!plugin.autotrade.localcheck'
*set ship command preload script: command=$cmd.sector script='!plugin.autotrade.local.preload'
*global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[TS], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
*global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[TP], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
*global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[TM], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
*global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[M3], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
*global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[M4], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
*global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[M6], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
*global script map: ignore: key=$cmd.sector, class=[Freight Drone], race=[Player]
*global script map: ignore: key=$cmd.sector, class=[Fighter Drone], race=[Player]
* $station = find station in galaxy: startsector=$sector class or type={Aldrin {}Unused{} (DOCK_LC_4)} race=[Argon] flags=[Find.Nearest] refobj=null serial=null max.jumps=50
* $station-> add product to factory or dock: $cmd.ware
* $station = find station in galaxy: startsector=$sector class or type={Argon OTAS HQ} race=[Argon] flags=[Find.Nearest] refobj=null serial=null max.jumps=50
* $station-> add product to factory or dock: $cmd.ware
* $station = find station in galaxy: startsector=$sector class or type={Teladi Military Outpost} race=null flags=[Find.Nearest] refobj=null serial=null max.jumps=50
* $station-> add product to factory or dock: $cmd.ware
* $station = find station in galaxy: startsector=$sector class or type={Teladi Space Equipment Dock} race=[Teladi] flags=[Find.Random] refobj=null serial=null max.jumps=null
* $station-> add product to factory or dock: $cmd.ware
* set script command upgrade: command=$cmd upgrade={Trade Command Software MK3}
* global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[TS], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[TP], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[TM], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[M3], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[M4], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
* global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[M6], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
* global script map: remove: key=[COMMAND_TYPE_SHIP_22], class=[Ship], race=[Player]
* global script map: ignore: key=[COMMAND_TYPE_SHIP_22], class=[Ship], race=[Player]

sval.val: Autotrade - Initialisation of sector- and universetrader scripts
MK3 Improvement
Gnasirator (03.12.2012)
makes an additional log entry due load games or new games
delete old named global var
Sector + Local Trader Setup
set script command upgrade: command=$cmd.sector upgrade=$cmd.ware script='!plugin.autotrade.localcheck'
set ship command preload script: command=$cmd.sector script='!plugin.autotrade.local.preload'
global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[TS], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[TP], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[TM], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[M3], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[M4], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
global script map: set: key=$cmd.sector, class=[M6], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.local.start', prio=0
Galaxy Trader Setup
Drones Ignore
global script map: ignore: key=$cmd.sector, class=[Freight Drone], race=[Player]
global script map: ignore: key=$cmd.sector, class=[Fighter Drone], race=[Player]
if [PLAYERSHIP]
$sector = [PLAYERSHIP]-> get sector
$station = find station in galaxy: startsector=$sector class or type={Aldrin {}Unused{} (DOCK_LC_4)} race=[Argon] flags=[Find.Nearest] refobj=null serial=null max.jumps=50
if $station-> exists
if not $station-> trades with ware $cmd.ware
$station-> add product to factory or dock: $cmd.ware
= $station-> add 1 units of $cmd.ware
$station = find station in galaxy: startsector=$sector class or type={Argon OTAS HQ} race=[Argon] flags=[Find.Nearest] refobj=null serial=null max.jumps=50
if $station-> exists
if not $station-> trades with ware $cmd.ware
$station-> add product to factory or dock: $cmd.ware
= $station-> add 1 units of $cmd.ware
$station = find station in galaxy: startsector=$sector class or type={Teladi Military Outpost} race=null flags=[Find.Nearest] refobj=null serial=null max.jumps=50
if $station-> exists
if not $station-> trades with ware $cmd.ware
$station-> add product to factory or dock: $cmd.ware
= $station-> add 1 units of $cmd.ware
while $i
dec $i
$station = find station in galaxy: startsector=$sector class or type={Teladi Space Equipment Dock} race=[Teladi] flags=[Find.Random] refobj=null serial=null max.jumps=null
if $station-> exists
if not $station-> trades with ware $cmd.ware
$station-> add product to factory or dock: $cmd.ware
= $station-> add 1 units of $cmd.ware
MK3 Cargo Manager
Gnasirator (13.02.2012)
Command setup
$cmd = [COMMAND_TYPE_SHIP_47]
set global variable: name='autotrade.ware.bl.mgr.cmd' value=$cmd
set script command upgrade: command=$cmd upgrade={Trade Command Software MK3}
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[TS], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[TP], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[TM], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[M3], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[M4], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[M6], race=[Player], script='!plugin.autotrade.start.bl.mgr', prio=0
global script map: remove: key=[COMMAND_TYPE_SHIP_22], class=[Ship], race=[Player]
global script map: ignore: key=[COMMAND_TYPE_SHIP_22], class=[Ship], race=[Player]
